Package com.github.alexisc183.jforconsol.sugar

package com.github.alexisc183.jforconsol.sugar

Provides syntactical constructs to extend the functional features of Java.

@since JForconsol 1.0.0

    com.github.alexisc183.jforconsol
    Provides classes and interfaces mainly for CLI app development.

    Description
    BiTuple<T,U>
    Data structure containing two items that may be of different data types.
    Do
    Utility for mutating objects in an expression-only context.

    TetraTuple<T,U,V,W>
    Data structure containing four items that may be of different data types.

    Utility class for throwing exceptions in expressions.
